IndexPage.title: MBI Group is a company with 15 years of experience
IndexPage.description: MBI Group is a leading company specializing in prefabricated and traditional construction with over 15 years of experience.

Features.feature1Description: We always find energy solutions by providing solar and wind energy services.
Features.feature2Description: The company provides all shipping-related services and also through shipping offices.
Features.feature3Description: We can build integrated facilities and there are also mobile facilities, and we also build warehouses.
Features.feature4Description: Over 15 years of experience in the field, with a complete team of engineers and professionals.

Products.sectionTitle: Our Best Products - Get Them Now!

product.whatsappMessage: I need to buy this product:

solar-energy.title: Solar Energy
solar-energy.description: The quality of technologies used, the performance of solar panels, battery life, and storage capacity are the strengths of renewable solar and wind energy provided by the MBI group in all its installations. MBI offers several systems, including an automatic backup electrical system that operates without interruption, called a hybrid system, a direct power system from solar panels only, called a 9am to 4pm daily system, a 24/7 continuous system that stores energy for 24 hours as needed, a storage system with direct recharge from electricity, offering a reserve period of up to 12 hours, and a dual system combining solar, wind, electric, and generator energy, being the most powerful and economical system in terms of consumption after installation.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.description: The MBI group offers advanced and economical solutions and strategies in the agricultural field, such as creating fodder farms, whether through pivot systems, provided by large French and Turkish companies, or through irrigation systems with a team of experts in Turkey, Spain, and the United States, or through drip irrigation systems, thanks to Italian and Turkish industries. Vegetable and fruit farms, whether covered or not, lead new experiments in date and banana ripening, and have achieved a remarkable economic leap in the field of fodder, especially with hydroponic barley cultivation in prefabricated containers, at low cost and offering quick results.

water-electricity.title: Water and Electricity
water-electricity.description: MBI company also operates in the field of electricity supply, whether through poles or underground cables. It builds technical rooms containing conversion and distribution units, installs them, and provides them along with cables and all associated electrical equipment. Regarding the water field, it carries out drilling for drinking water and builds water reservoirs of all types, in iron, cement, and plastic.

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.description: The MBI group has special equipment for topography in logistics, total stations and GPS, as well as heavy and light vehicles, such as 4x4s, bulldozers, tractors, trucks, cranes, and water drilling units.

sandwich-panel.title: Sandwich Panel
sandwich-panel.description: MBI company offers all industrial designs of sandwich panels that it has been importing from Turkey for over ten years. They are distinguished by their rust-proof galvanized metal structure and dense thermal insulation in polystyrene and polyurethane, as well as the strength of their coating from 0.30 to 0.50. Available in different dimensions to meet various needs, they have been used in many projects in Mauritania. This material offers all units: warehouses, factories, houses, workshops, offices, agencies, mobile rooms, clinics, guard posts, bleachers, cafes, and even floors. All this and more, according to the client's needs. Many projects have been carried out in Mauritania.

veterinary.title: Livestock
veterinary.description: In 2015, the MBI group established a model farm of Holstein cows imported from Germany in the Trarza region, giving impressive results. It therefore specializes in the construction of farms, factories, and milking rooms, as well as in the import of cows and sheep from regions renowned worldwide.

fiber-cement.title: Fiber Cement
fiber-cement.description: Fiber-cement is a composite building material, made of cement and fibers. Primarily mineral, it imitates wood. Solid and versatile, it is suitable for various applications. Composed of cellulose, sand, and cement, it forms light and robust boards. Fiber-cement is durable and resistant. Walls are built on a metal base, associated with rock wool, an effective thermal and acoustic insulator. Suitable for all uses: internal partitions, facade cladding. Compatible with all types of paint and architecture, with a durability of over 30 years.

elevator.title: Elevator
elevator.description:
MBI Company is a company specializing in services concerning elevators for tall buildings. It provides elevators and associated services, installation, maintenance, and other services. It provides quality services in this field. It is present in Nouakchott and Nouadhibou and is known for its quality services. It has been present in these two cities for several years where it provides quality installation, maintenance, and other associated services in this field. 
Installation: panoramic elevator 
Installation with a metal structure 
Installation with concrete blocks.

follow-up-study.title: Follow-up Study
follow-up-study.description:
The MBI group operates in the fields of study, monitoring, and planning, with a specialized team and has the necessary logistical equipment such as:
-Total station
-Differential GPS
-Levels
-DRONE (topographic survey)
-Road project construction
-Vehicles, cars, trucks, bulldozers, and excavators.

AboutUs.ModernBuildingIndustry: Modern Building Industry is a leading group specializing in prefabricated construction of all kinds and its derivatives based on sandwich panel, fiber cement, guibs board, OCB, chinguele, and PVC.
AboutUs.ExperienceDescription: MBI has more than 15 years of experience and work and has carried out several projects with the private and public sectors, including residential complexes, factory and warehouse installation, office construction, tourist villages, and commercial agencies. It also provides all types of European and Turkish fences. Here are some projects as examples:
AboutUs.Projet1: Construction of mining centers in Mauritania, Somelec, Radio Mauritania, Land Transport Administration, National Gendarmerie, Road Safety, Public Transport, Tanit Port, Sweed Organization, People's Bank of Mauritania, TAAZOUR, Fish Marketing Company, Sogeco, Ministry of Sanitation, Ministry of Health and National Security, TDM Broadcasting and Television Company, and KENZ Mining Company.
AboutUs.Projet2: As for the private sector, we have established water and plastic factories and built a large number of warehouses, halls, dwellings, and mobile premises.
AboutUs.Projet3: The MBI group also works in the field of solar energy with all its systems (24/7) continuous, Backup power (hybrid), Daily energy powered by sunlight. It also has several projects implemented in this field.
AboutUs.ProjetsEnergie: It also has several projects implemented in this field.
AboutUs.EtudesDescription: The MBI group works in the fields of study, monitoring, and planning and has specialized personnel in this field and has logistics equipment for this, including machines such as:
AboutUs.Vehicules: And vehicles, cars, trucks, and tractors as well.
AboutUs.MBIAGRO: The MBI group also has a branch specializing in the field of livestock and agriculture, MBI AGRO.
AboutUs.MBIAGRODescription: MBI AGRO has implemented several projects in the agricultural field and has been able to give tangible results in the wilaya of Hodh Ech Chargui and Inchiri since 2015. Today, MBI AGRO is working on a new system called cultivation and maturation, which is a rapid process that takes place inside these prefabricated containers. This qualitative and economical system produces food daily.
AboutUs.MBIMedicalDescription: In the health field, the group has MBI medical which offers integrated and ready-to-use health units such as:
AboutUs.AppareilsExamen: It also provides all examination devices:
AboutUs.LitsFauteuils: All types of beds and wheelchairs
AboutUs.MBISecuriteDescription: The MBI Group also participates in the field of protection, with their MBI security branch, which provides special clothing for firefighters and workshop workers, shoes, protective helmets, ABC and CO2 powder fire extinguishers, etc.
AboutUs.MektbakDescription: Regarding the layout, design, and installation of offices, the MBI group offers, through Mektbak, high-quality offices with modern design, meeting rooms, luxury seats and lounges, air conditioners, and computer units. All this and more is made available to you by MBI at its headquarters.
